data.comment: The match has started at Mandemakers Stadion.
The first-half is over at Mandemakers Stadion.
In the minute 46, The second half has started at Mandemakers Stadion.
Goal! Sparta have taken a 0-1 lead courtesy of a header from Lennart Thy.
Great play from Sven Mijnans to set up the goal.
In the minute 62, The home team have replaced Vitalie Damascan with Finn Stokkers. This is the first substitution made today by Fred Grim.
Fred Grim (Waalwijk) is making a second substitution, with Lennerd Daneels replacing Ola John.
Richard van der Venne is replacing Anas Tahiri for Waalwijk at Mandemakers Stadion.
In the minute 72, Morad el Haddouti is replacing Cyril Ngonge for the home team.
Henk Fraser is making the team's first substitution at Mandemakers Stadion with Wouter Burger replacing Bryan Smeets.
Deroy Duarte (Sparta) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 87, The home team replace Said Bakari with Paul Quasten.
Emanuel Emegha is on a sub for Lennart Thy for Sparta.
Sparta make their third substitution with Tom Beugelsdijk replacing Sven Mijnans.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 0-2.
Sparta's Mica Pinto has been booked in Waalwijk.
Great finish from Abdou Harroui to give Sparta a 0-2 lead.
Deroy Duarte with an assist there.
